summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Purchase Order creation form with line items. All backend APIs (16 tests) passed. Frontend UI testing verified all required features are working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created multiple test POs via API and UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All PO features are working. Test data prefixed with 'TEST_' and 'UI_TEST_' was created during testing.

PO_list_page_columns.details: All required columns present: PO Number, PO Date, Purchase Office, Created By, Qty, Total Value, Status, Actions

create_po_dialog.details: Dialog opens correctly when clicking 'Create Purchase Order' button

po_date_field.details: Date picker field present and functional

purchase_office_dropdown.details: Dropdown with 3 options: Magnova Head Office, Magnova Branch Office, Nova Enterprises

line_items_table_columns.details: All columns present: SL No, Vendor, Location, Brand, Model, Storage, Colour, IMEI, Qty, Rate, PO Value, Action

add_another_item_button.details: Button adds new line item row correctly

remove_button.details: X button removes line item row correctly

po_value_auto_calculation.details: PO Value auto-calculates as Qty * Rate

total_row.details: Total row shows sum of Qty and PO Value

create_po_submission.details: Form submits successfully and creates new PO with success toast

view_po_details_dialog.details: Shows PO header info (PO Date, Purchase Office, Created By, Status) and line items table

backend_api_post.details: POST /api/purchase-orders creates PO with line items correctly

backend_api_get.details: GET /api/purchase-orders returns POs with all new fields
